lines.text:
[in Rod Serling voice]
Behind this curtain lies the scariest picture known to man. It has caused thousands to have horrifying nightmares...
It's my third grade school photo! AHHHH!
[switches back to Rod Serling and kicks the photo out of view]
But, I digress. Here's something *almost* as frightening...
[Plucky arrives at Montana Max's house. The house is in flames]

[cringes]
Either Monty made a deal with the devil, or Shannon Doherty's spending the night.

[falling into a hole that leads to Hell]
You'll pay for this, you cheap shyster!
Cheap? Wait 'til you get my bill!
[after Monty and Daniel Webfoot land in Hell]

[gulps]
It looks like... I think this is...
That's right, Mr. Webfoot. Sooner or later, most lawyers end up here.

In the cartoon, The Amazing Three, there was a slight flutter on Fifi's face in scene C43, and I wanted to know if that was a deliberate in-joke, or just a mistake. And when is Fifi gonna get her own series?
lines.character: The World's Biggest Tiny Toon Fan

lines.text:
[singing]
Tonight's my night, I'm the Pumpkin Guy, on all Hallow's Eve, I'll fly through the sky, but alas and alack, I'm bored out of my skull, my once favorite holiday has grown so dull! It's tired, trite, and also routine, I crave different thrills on this Halloween. I wonder what hides beyond this door, It just might be what I'm looking for.
